dc_description_s: The dataset contains the geo-location info, name and type of the health facilities in Zambia. The data is created by Zambia central statistical office. The World Bank and the International Finance Corporation, collectively the World Bank Group (WBG) strives to enhance public access to and use of data that can support development impact.
